extendedInfo.description: The dino paradise needs a color mix genius. Would you be the one? Itâs a color splash dinosaur war coloring book for kids. So touch and move around to fill in crazy colors to black and white dino world and create striking images. Itâs amazingly easy and fun filled coloring tool for kids. Happy Coloring!***How To Play***â Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now use finger as a brush to color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are done***Game Play Features***â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬â Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted colorâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this coloring book, a nice music plays behind to boost up his thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât want to force the eraser all around? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the color splash photo that your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery ***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: BEWARE
reviews.comment: Annoying notification area ads! Uses air push.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has notification ads
